sections.heading: ACTING AS PHYSICIAN WHILE INTOXICATED
sections.text:
18-4202. ACTING AS PHYSICIAN WHILE INTOXICATED. Every physician who, in a state of intoxication, does any act as such physician to another person by which the life of such other person is endangered, is guilty of a misdemeanor.

[18-4202, added 1972, ch. 336, sec. 1, p. 933.]
